title: FlexPay News
summary: This page lists recent news and announcements from FlexPay, a company focused on revenue acceleration and customer retention for subscription businesses. It highlights partnerships, product launches, and customer success stories related to failed payment recovery.
key_points: FlexPay helps businesses recover failed payments and minimize churn.
Recent news includes partnerships with ROI Solutions, Nexio, and Chargify.
FlexPay has launched Engaged Recovery and received a CNP Customer Choice Award.
Case studies highlight significant revenue recovery for clients like Humane World of Animals.
